game_description: As a discountï¼Œ you can buy the game for only $0.99 this week! This is an exciting VR aerial combat game. It combines elements of naval warfare. Your mission is flying an aircraft from the carrier, finding and clearing all enemy warships. Besides flying and shooting, you can also experience taking off and landing from an aircraft carrier. In addition, there are many intense missions about aerial combat or naval warfare, such as air raid, protecting the oil rig platform, breaking through the valley, escaping from the cave and so on.
